etymologies: mid 17th century: from Latin iconicus, from Greek eikonikos, from eikōn ‘likeness, image’

definitions: relating to or of the nature of an icon

examples.text: language is not in general an iconic sign system

shortDefinitions: of, relating to, or of nature of icon

definitions: (of a classical Greek statue) depicting a victorious athlete in a conventional style.
shortDefinitions: (of classical Greek statue) depicting victorious athlete in conventional style
